item.title: Easy-peasy Q&A bot
item.description: Everyone seems to have a live chat option for their site but I’m frequently away, so I wanted something that people could talk to interactively. This is a perfect scenario for a Q&A bot. Microsoft takes a ton of the pain out of Q&A bots, and it was much easier than I thought to get it added to my WordPress blog. Here is a how to do it for your site.
